name: Call of Agents
summary: Fight against street gangs and other criminals. Apply martial arts maneuvers and super abilities of your character. Protect peaceful citizens from bandits and rescue the world from super villains in this Android game. You will experience many battles in various locations. Hordes of enemies will attack your character from all sides. You must move a superhero across the battle field in time and apply various abilities including regular hits and jumps as well as laser beams and lightnings. Gain experience, level up your hero.
